name: In re ADOPTION of C. L. P., a minor child. Appeal of J. M. C.
name_abbreviation: In re Adoption of C. L. P.

judges: Before EAGEN, C. J., and O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY and KAUFFMAN, JJ.
parties: In re ADOPTION of C. L. P., a minor child. Appeal of J. M. C.

opinions.text:
OPINION
PER CURIAM:
Decree affirmed. Each party to pay own costs.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: David A. McVey, Stevens, Clark, Laubach & Semple, Pittsburgh, for appellant.
Robert C. Hillen, Pittsburgh, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
412 A.2d 881
In re ADOPTION of C. L. P., a minor child. Appeal of J. M. C.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued March 4, 1980.
Decided April 10, 1980.
David A. McVey, Stevens, Clark, Laubach & Semple, Pittsburgh, for appellant.
Robert C. Hillen, Pittsburgh, for appellee.
Before EAGEN, C. J., and O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY and KAUFFMAN, JJ.
